ttp_template:
<group name="dynamic_domain_dynamic_server_count">
  - domain: {{DYNAMIC_DOMAIN}}, default DNS server count: {{DYNAMIC_SERVER_COUNT | ORPHRASE}}
</group>
cli_content:
Query source-interface: Not set

Dynamic Query Domain List:
  - domain: example.com, default DNS server count: 2
  - domain: test.com, default DNS server count: 1

Static Query Domain List:
  - domain: staticdomain.com, DNS server: 192.168.1.1

Processed DNS Query Statistics:
  Total Queries: 15
  Successful Queries: 13
  Failed Queries: 2
textfsm_template:
Value SOURCE_INTERFACE (.*)
Value DYNAMIC_DOMAIN (.*)
Value DYNAMIC_SERVER_COUNT (\d+)
Value STATIC_DOMAIN (.*)
Value STATIC_SERVER (.*)
Value TOTAL_QUERIES (\d+)
Value SUCCESSFUL_QUERIES (\d+)
Value FAILED_QUERIES (\d+)

Start
  ^Query\s+source-interface:\s+${SOURCE_INTERFACE}\s*$$
  ^Dynamic\s+Query\s+Domain\s+List:\s*$$
  ^\s+-\s+domain:\s+${DYNAMIC_DOMAIN},\s+default\s+DNS\s+server\s+count:\s+${DYNAMIC_SERVER_COUNT}\s*$$ -> Record
  ^Static\s+Query\s+Domain\s+List:\s*$$
  ^\s+-\s+domain:\s+${STATIC_DOMAIN},\s+DNS\s+server:\s+${STATIC_SERVER}\s*$$ -> Record
  ^Processed\s+DNS\s+Query\s+Statistics:\s*$$
  ^\s*Total\s+Queries:\s+${TOTAL_QUERIES}\s*$$
  ^\s*Successful\s+Queries:\s+${SUCCESSFUL_QUERIES}\s*$$
  ^\s*Failed\s+Queries:\s+${FAILED_QUERIES}\s*$$
